author: Anonym
title: [HIGHLIGHTS] CDC finds COVID-19 vaccines not linked to fatal heart problems in young people
text: A new report debunks baseless theories online that mRNA injections were linked to cardiac arrests in athletes like Damar Hamlin, the Buffalo Bills safety who collapsed during a game in 2023. Since the Pfizer and Moderna vaccines were authorized in late 2020, anti-vaccination groups in the United States have blamed the shots for deadly heart problems in young athletes. The new report's findings come from an analysis of nearly 1,300 death certificates of Oregon residents ages 16 to 30 who died from a heart condition or unknown reasons between June 1, 2021 and December 31, 2022. Of the 40 deaths that occurred among people who received an mRNA COVID-19 vaccine, three occurred in that time period. Two of the deaths were attributed to underlying chronic diseases. The third death was recorded as “undetermined natural cause,” and toxicology tests were negative for alcohol, cannabis, methamphetamine or other illicit substances. “When you weigh the risks and benefits, you have to look at that and say, 'You have to go for the vaccine,'” he said.

author: The Herald
title: ZC bans Madhevere, Mavuta
text: Zimbabwe Cricket has banned national team players Wessly Madhevere and Brandon Mavuta from cricket for four months for recreational drug use. The two received the sanction after admitting — when they appeared for a disciplinary hearing last Wednesday — to charges of breaching the ZC Employment Code of Conduct that arose when they tested positive for a banned recreational drug during an in-house doping test in December. On top of the ban, Madhevere and Mavuta have been fined 50 percent of their salaries for three months, with effect from January 2024, while they also received final written warnings valid for 12 months. As they undergo rehabilitation overseen by ZC medical personnel, they have also been ordered to train under ZC’s High-Performance program. In a statement, ZC said they have zero tolerance towards drugs and drug taking and, in imposing the sanctions, the Disciplinary Committee considered that drug taking was a serious offence and that the breach by the two players had brought the organisation and the game of cricket into disrepute. In taking the decision, the Committee also considered some mitigating factors, with both players showing remorse and having already started working on withdrawing from the habit and getting their systems clean. Mavuta issued a public statement apologising to cricket stakeholders last week. Meanwhile, ZC has with immediate effect suspended another national team player, Kevin Kasuza, from all cricket activities, pending a hearing, after he tested positive for a banned recreational drug during an in-house doping test last week. He is due to appear for a disciplinary hearing soon. Kasuza is being charged under the ZC Employment Code of Conduct — Sports Reporter/Zimbabwe Cricket.

author: 作者：黄婧
title: "三支一扶"来了！每年补贴3.6万元，广西今年计划招1652人，6月13日起报名→-广西新闻网
text:
|
想去基层干事创业吗？想就来吧！6月12日，自治区高校毕业生三支一扶工作协调管理办公室发布公告，2025年广西将招募1652名高校毕业生到基层从事支农、支医、支教和帮扶乡村振兴工作（以下简称“三支一扶”）。 谁能报名 如果你是2023年至2025年毕业的普通高等教育毕业生，有志于从事乡镇基层工作，符合招募条件的都可报名。报考医疗、农技、水利、林业岗位的可放宽至2021年至2025年毕业。具有大专（含高职高专）及以上学历的，须在2025年7月31日前取得相应的毕业证。技工院校高级工班、技工院校预备技师（技师）班毕业生可按相当于大专、本科学历报考。年龄30周岁以下（1995年7月31日后出生），报考国家和自治区乡村振兴重点帮扶县、执行艰苦边远地区津贴政策的岗位年龄可放宽至32周岁（1993年7月31日后出生）。 值得注意的是，在读的非2025年应届毕业的专升本人员、研究生不得以已取得的学历、学位证书报考；已参加过“三支一扶”服务的人员不得报名。 如何报考 想报考的人员可进入市级组织人事部门网站查看招募公告，了解招募岗位、资格条件等信息。6月13日9时~6月19日18时，符合条件的报考人员可通过各市级组织人事部门网站免费报名。6月13日9时~6月20日24时，通过资格审核的考生，需要登录网上报名系统确认参加笔试。确认笔试后在笔试环节弃考的人员，次年起不得再报考广西“三支一扶”计划。 本次“三支一扶”笔试将安排在7月5日9时30分~11时30分，7月15日12时后可登录网上报名系统查询本人笔试成绩。笔试合格分数线计划于7月18日前在广西人事考试网公布。 福利待遇 广西“三支一扶”人员服务期为2年。服务期间，发放工作生活补贴每人每年36000元，发放一次性交通补贴每人每年500元，参加社会保险，有商业意外保险。服务单位发放每人每月不低于600元的岗位津贴，落实食宿等生活保障。新招募且在岗服务满6个月的广西“三支一扶”人员，发放一次性安家费补贴每人3000元。 广西为“三支一扶”人员提供有力的政策保障。例如服务期满并考核合格的“三支一扶”人员，经相关部门审核后颁发相应的服务证书，享受中央、自治区有关高校应届毕业生就业创业、报考公务员及事业单位招聘的各项优惠政策；服务期满后3年内凭服务证书报考硕士研究生的，初试总分加10分，同等条件下优先录取；高职高专毕业生参加“三支一扶”计划服务期满考核合格的，可免试入读成人高等学历教育专科起点本科等。具体事宜可进入广西高校毕业生“三支一扶”服务网（http://szyf.gxrc.com）查询政策或向各市“三支一扶”办公室电话咨询。 本文由南国早报原创出品，未经许可，任何渠道、平台请勿转载。违者必究。 |
